solution_line_template: He needs {tablespoons_per_dozen} tablespoons of lemon juice for every dozen of cupcakes and he's making {num_dozens} dozen cupcakes so he needs {tablespoons_per_dozen}*{num_dozens} = <<{tablespoons_per_dozen}*{num_dozens}={total_tablespoons_needed}>>{total_tablespoons_needed} tablespoons of lemon juice

1 lemon provides {tablespoons_per_lemon} tablespoons of lemon juice and he needs {total_tablespoons_needed} tablespoons so he will need {total_tablespoons_needed}/{tablespoons_per_lemon} = <<{total_tablespoons_needed}/{tablespoons_per_lemon}={lemons_needed}>>{lemons_needed} lemons
